item.description:
What is involved in acquiring and protecting intellectual property? And why is this important to the overall success of your company? Does the intellectual strategy change as a company grows from idea to start up to a company with marketable products? Come to a panel discussion of seasoned professionals and find out!

 

Our Crossing Boundaries series continues with our latest event: Crossing boundaries on the road to innovation: Avoiding IP pitfalls along the way on September 22, 2011. This program will consist of two parts - a brief introduction to patents followed by a panel discussion. The first part will describe the form, function, and future of patents. The second part will be a panel discussion surrounding the issues and pitfalls associated with IP as one moves from innovation to marketed product, including: IP capture; tracking and triage; IP transfer; and IP commercialization. Learn how what you do (whether scientist or accountant) matters to intellectual property and understand how to protect it.

Click on the link to register: https://netforum.avec...
item.name: HBA Boston event on avoiding IP pitfalls along the value chain
